name: Andrzej Ito

I have a proven record of conducting risk-based security assessments and implementing security frameworks, while managing **cloud identity** and **access management**. My background in **containers** and **virtual machines** enhances my ability to architect scalable systems that exceed client expectations, while my commitment to mentoring and leading cross-functional teams drives collaborative success in every project. I am dedicated to fostering technical excellence and enhancing user experience through innovative software solutions.
